channel.title: A very fun and dedicated 2006 based Server! 24/7 uptime (On the Dedi)
channel.description:
Join here, and have a blast at FatalityRS.net! 24/7 uptime (on a very powerful Dedicated Server)
Download the client here, and/or register on the FatalityRS.net forums!
FatalityRS Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/n9zmjbhiftdshbz/FatalityRS%20%20Official%20Client.jar
http://i60.tinypic.com/34tco5x.png
[ul][li]OriginalNPC Spawns[/li] [li]Young Economy[/li] [li]Original Dueling+Staking[/li] [li]Chests random rares System[/li] [li]Boss Key System[/li] [li]Pick-pocketing NPC System[/li] [li]Gnome Agility with rewards[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Slayer Tasks[/li] [li]Full Slayer Tower[/li] [li]Multiple Bosses[/li] [li]Barrows Mini[/li] [li]Fight Caves[/li] [li]Fremennik Mazes Mini[/li] [li]Dagannoth Mini[/li] [li]Khazard Mini[/li] [li]Working Auto-casting[/li] [li]High and low Alching[/li]
[li]Mining[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Agility[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Herblore[/li] [li]Thieving[/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Fletching[/li] [li]Slayer[/li] [li]Melee[/li] [li]Ranging[/li] [li]Ancient Magic[/li] [li]Prayer training[/li] [li]Runecrafting[/li][/ul]
http://i57.tinypic.com/34hgm88.png
http://i57.tinypic.com/11t6i36.png
http://i62.tinypic.com/kbzm3a.png
http://i57.tinypic.com/dg6qlh.png
http://i60.tinypic.com/qoaqdu.png
http://i48.tinypic.com/a2es9c.jpg
http://i50.tinypic.com/28cnhhe.jpg
http://i58.tinypic.com/y3q9.png
http://i60.tinypic.com/9qzbpz.jpg
http://i57.tinypic.com/8wb3bl.png
http://i59.tinypic.com/2rfuhzc.png
http://i57.tinypic.com/2f0ant3.png
http://i58.tinypic.com/23lxnas.png
http://i58.tinypic.com/sl1x06.
http://i58.tinypic.com/2vhtaag.png
http://i60.tinypic.com/15nvnzo.png
Our server is growing much faster than I even thought it would, so I need developers!

item.title: A very fun and dedicated 2006 based Server! 24/7 uptime (On the Dedi)
item.dc:creator: @furyking50 furyking50
item.description:
@furyking50 wrote:

Ykcud:

Cant even code for the music to be muted. When I asked how do I mute it I was told to go into my sound settings. That is not a good sign and I quit before putting in a single minute. I don’t recommend anyone going on this server until the owners (yes according to the ::help command there is more than one) can accomplish coding the basics for the server. I have learned not to invest time in a server lacking basic features.

Because this is a leech

Read full topic
item.source: A very fun and dedicated 2006 based Server! 24/7 uptime (On the Dedi)

item.title: A very fun and dedicated 2006 based Server! 24/7 uptime (On the Dedi)
item.dc:creator: @Ykcud Ykcud
item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

Cant even code for the music to be muted. When I asked how do I mute it I was told to go into my sound settings. That is not a good sign and I quit before putting in a single minute. I don’t recommend anyone going on this server until the owners (yes according to the ::help command there is more than one) can accomplish coding the basics for the server. I have learned not to invest time in a server lacking basic features.
